title: Some popish errors, unadvisedly embraced and pursued by our anticommunion ministers wherein is discovered the dangerous effects of their discontinuing the frequent publick administration of the Lords Supper ... : with a new discovery of some Romish emmissaries, Quakers / by William Prynne of Swainswicke, Esquire ...
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Edward Thomas at his shop ...,
